channel.title: A bit of help if you can. :@
channel.description: Okay, heres the deal. I live out in the middle of nowhere, where there is no internet but dial-up and I don't even have that. I drive 30 miles to the local library to get online with my very old laptop. Now that you know the situation... I'm trying to create some way of playing runescape offline. I downloaded the moparscape client and it works offline, but... eh well, it sucks to just play by itself. I downloaded a bunch of sources/cache from server downloads. I guess my question is how I can use those for moparscape client and play them offline? I just want to be able to fight npc's and train levels like the normal game. I've tried tinkering around with compiling, but I feel I'm doing more damage than anything else. -_- I'm sorry if there is a guide and I missed it, but I looked as hard as I could with this very bad signal phone.

item.title: A bit of help if you can. :@
item.dc:creator: @jack_muff jack muff
item.description:
@jack_muff wrote:

I’ll be sure to look at a bunch of those servers tomorrow when I go to the library. How do I use the cache/source on moparscape client?

Read full topic
item.source: A bit of help if you can. :@

item.title: A bit of help if you can. :@
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

jack muff:

Can it be the moparscape 3.2 client? I have one other client but it wants to connect to the internet everytime I try. How do I make sure it’s on localhost?

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Just download a source + client and run it on localhost. No need for internet.

@jack_muff wrote:

Okay, heres the deal. I live out in the middle of nowhere, where there is no internet but dial-up and I don’t even have that. I drive 30 miles to the local library to get online with my very old laptop. Now that you know the situation…
I’m trying to create some way of playing runescape offline. I downloaded the moparscape client and it works offline, but… eh well, it sucks to just play by itself. I downloaded a bunch of sources/cache from server downloads. I guess my question is how I can use those for moparscape client and play them offline? I just want to be able to fight npc’s and train levels like the normal game. I’ve tried tinkering around with compiling, but I feel I’m doing more damage than anything else. -_-
